messages.hospitalInactive: Hospital inactive for more than 30 days

messages.emailServiceDesc: Email service is not working correctly.
messages.securityBreachDesc: Suspicious activity has been detected in the system.
messages.userLockedDesc: User {userName} has been locked due to multiple failed login attempts.

messages.networkUnavailableDesc: Cannot connect to network. Check connectivity.
messages.serviceUnavailableDesc: Service {serviceName} is not available at this time.
messages.permissionDeniedDesc: User {userName} does not have permission to perform {action}.
messages.resourceNotFoundDesc: Could not find resource {resourceType} with ID {resourceId}.
messages.concurrentModificationDesc: Resource {resourceName} was modified by another user.
messages.cacheMissDesc: Could not find data in cache for key {cacheKey}.
messages.queueOverflowDesc: Queue {queueName} has reached its maximum capacity.
messages.authorizationFailedDesc: User {userName} is not authorized to perform {action}.
messages.tokenInvalidDesc: Authentication token is invalid or has expired.
messages.backupCorruptedDesc: Backup {backupName} is corrupted and cannot be restored.
messages.deprecatedFeatureDesc: Feature {featureName} is deprecated and will be removed in version {version}.
messages.predictionAccuracyDesc: Prediction accuracy for {modelName} has dropped to {accuracy}%.
messages.scalabilityDesc: System has reached {scalability}% of its scaling capacity.
